"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f118e663687207b4210c00#post_54f118e663687207b4210c00
Yes! The censoring almost ruined the anime, and it was an exaggeration!
This is how it looked the anime when the censoring was in the start:

!http://giant.gfycat.com/EuphoricHalfGilamonster.gif!

Fortunately, the censoring is gone, and you can finally watch the gore and that ridiculous scene of above where the roach kills people with a human spine.
